__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.USER_UNAUTHORIZED: Device is not authorized. Please authorize device again.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.DEVICE_OUT_OF_SYNC: Device time is out of sync. Please check the time on your device reflects current date and time.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.NETWORK_ERROR: Request could not be executed due to cancellation, a connectivity problem or timeout.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.INVALID_MNEMONICS: The 12 word passphrase you provided is incorrect.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.INVALID_QR_TRANSACTION_DATA: The QR code for executing a transaction is not well formed. To know the data definition for QR code based on type of operations please visit https://dev.ost.com/platform
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.INVALID_USER_PASSPHRASE: The 6 digit PIN you entered is not correct.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.MAX_PASSPHRASE_VERIFICATION_LIMIT_REACHE: The maximum number of 'authenticating with PIN' attempts has been reached. Please try again a bit later.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.DEVICE_CAN_NOT_BE_AUTHORIZED: Unable to authorize this device. Please ensure the device is 'Registered' for this user with OST platform. Only a registered device can be authorized.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.SESSION_NOT_FOUND: The device doesn't has any active session. Please authorize a session before doing any transaction. Workflow details provided at https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/sdk/references
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.RECOVERY_KEY_GENERATION_FAILED: Failed to generate Recovery key. Inspect if a correct input values required are being sent and re-submit the request.
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.OUT_OF_MEMORY_ERROR: Device is running low on memory. Reduce the number of App running on your device and re-enter the pin
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.WORKFLOW_FAILED: Something went wrong, please try again
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.WORKFLOW_VIEW_DESTROYED: The application interrupted the workflow. The view got terminated while performing the workflow
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.DEVICE_UNAUTHORIZED: Unable to perform the operation as the device not authorized. For details on how to authorize a device please visit https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/sdk/references
__DEFAULT_CONTEXT.DEVICE_CAN_NOT_BE_REVOKED: Cannot complete the revoke device operation. Only an authorized device can be revoked. Please ensure you are trying to revoke a valid device and re-submit the request.

__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.SDK_ERROR: An internal SDK error has occurred.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_CERTIFICATE: Certificate provided by Ost platform is invalid Or it has been compromised. Please re-try in some other network and if the problem persists contact support@ost.com .
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_USER_ID: Unable to recognize the user id. Please inspect for what is being sent, rectify and re-submit.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_WORKFLOW_CALLBACK: Callback is essential for a workflow to continue running, it cannot be null.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.CONFIG_READ_FAILED: Failed to read config file. Please place the ost-sdk config file in main/assets folder.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_BLOCK_GENERATION_TIME: Invalid configuration 'BLOCK_GENERATION_TIME'. It must be an Integer greater than zero
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_PIN_MAX_RETRY_COUNT: Invalid configuration 'PIN_MAX_RETRY_COUNT'. It must be an Integer greater than zero
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_SESSION_BUFFER_TIME: Invalid configuration 'SESSION_BUFFER_TIME'. It must be long greater than or equal to zero
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_PRICE_POINT_CURRENCY_SYMBOL: Unable to recognize 'PRICE_POINT_CURRENCY_SYMBOL'. For details on how supported currencies please vist https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/api
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_REQUEST_TIMEOUT_DURATION: Invalid configuration 'REQUEST_TIMEOUT_DURATION'. It must be Integer greater than zero.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_NO_OF_SESSIONS_ON_ACTIVATE_USER: Invalid configuration 'NO_OF_SESSIONS_ON_ACTIVATE_USER'. It must be an Integer greater than zero and less than 6
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_API_RESPONSE: Unable to recognize the API response object sent and so cannot be executed.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_JSON_STRING: The provided json string is invalid.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_JSON_ARRAY: The provided json array string is invalid.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_REVOKE_DEVICE_ADDRESS: Unable to recognise revoke device address. Please ensure you are sending a null value and re-submit the request.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.NO_PENDING_RECOVERY: Could not find any pending device recovery request. For details on how to check the status of the recovery please vist https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/sdk
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.EIP712_FAILED: Unable to sign parameters using EIP 712 and verify the signature.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.RULES_NOT_FOUND: Unable to recognize the Rule. Please inspect a valid rule name that exists in your economy is passed and its not null.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.DEVICE_NOT_SETUP: Unable to recognize the device. Please setup this device for the user using workflow provided at https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/sdk/references
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.DEVICE_NOT_REGISTERED: Device is not registered. To make any api to OST server device need to be registered
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.POLLING_TIMEOUT: Polling timeout. This can be intermittent event with a request failing followed by successful one.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_TOKEN_ID: The token id sent in Transaction QR code is not matching with the current user's token id. Rectify the value is being sent in token Id field and re-submit the request.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_RECOVER_DEVICE_ADDRESS: Invalid device address. This address can not be recovered.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_SESSION_EXPIRY_TIME: The expiry time provided is invalid
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_SESSION_SPENDING_LIMIT: The spending limit provided is invalid should be more than 0
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.RECOVERY_OWNER_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND: Recovery owner is not set for this user. This address is set during user activation. Please verify the user has been successfully activated.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INSUFFICIENT_DATA: The device does not have sufficient data to perform this action.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_SESSION_ADDRESS: Unable to recognize the session address. Inspect if a correct value is being sent and its not null.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.FAILED_TO_SIGN_DATA: Unable to sign data. Visit https://dev.ost.com/platform/docs/sdk for detailed SDK references. Please ensure the input is well formed and re-submit the request.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_DEVICE_ADDRESS: Incorrect device address. Please inspect the value being sent is correct and not null, rectify and re-submit.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.GENERATE_PRIVATE_KEY_FAIL: This is a generic error that occurs when sdk fails to generate any one of Api Key, Device Key or Session Key. This can be intermittent issue, please re-start the workflow. If Problem persists contact support@ost.com .
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_PASSPHRASE_PREFIX: Unable to recognize the Passphrase prefix. Please ensure Passphrase prefix is not null or it's string length is not less than 30.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.USER_NOT_ACTIVATED: The user is not activated yet. Please setup user's wallet to enable their participation in your economy.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.USER_ACTIVATING: User activation flow is already in progress. Please check the status a bit later
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.WORKFLOW_CANCELLED: Workflow got cancelled, possibly because one or more input parameters require a different type of information.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.INVALID_NEW_USER_PASSPHRASE: The new 6 digit PIN you entered is not correct.
__DEVELOPER_ERROR_MSG.USER_PASSPHRASE_VALIDATION_LOCKED: Can not validate user passphrase because of too many wrong attempts.
